copy.title: Step @:
copy.caption2: Choose the type of message you'd like to send.
copy.caption5: Get ready to send your message.
copy.sendconfirm: Are you sure you want to send this message?
copy.sendfailed: Sorry, something isn't right. Try again later!
copy.tinktip1: Leaving a message for another Fairy or Sparrow Man is easy! Just follow these four steps!
copy.tinktip2: Step 1: Choose stationery for your message.
copy.tinktip3: Step 2: Choose the type of message you'd like to send.
copy.tinktip6: Now you're ready to send your message!
copy.tutorial1: Want to leave a message for this person? It's easy! Just follow these three steps!
copy.tutorial2: Step 2: Choose the type of message you'd like to send.
copy.tutorial5: What a great message! Don't forget to send it!
copy.dbfail: Sorry, something's not right. Try back later!
